titleStmt.title: De termino Pasche. Anno. xvii. E. iiii

publicationStmt.publisher: Impressus per me Robertum Redman, co[m]morantem in pochia sancti Dunstani, ad signum diui Georgii,

notesStmt.note: Law reports for 17 Edward IV (Easter, Trinity, Michaelmas, and Hilary terms).

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
